Typography
Inconsolata and Roboto fonts have been selected as the fonts for this project.
Roboto
Inconsolata

Fallback

A sans-serif fallback font is used incase @font-face is not supported in the target browser.

Copryright

Roboto and Inconsolata are free software. For more details, please visit Google Fonts official website at https://fonts.google.com/
